p:
HBV is also a major cause of liver disease in Australia. According to GHE estimates in 2015, 37·7% deaths due to cirrhosis and other chronic liver diseases, and 34·0% of those due to liver cancer, resulted from hepatitis B infection ( table 2).
1 21·6% and 20·8% of these deaths were due to hepatitis C.
1 Acute hepatitis B and C infection accounted for 56·6% and 17·5% of all deaths due to acute hepatitis in Australia in 2015.
1
